name: repeaterbook
description: A web-based application that displays amateur radio repeaters on an interactive map, allowing users to search for repeaters near their location across the USA and Canada.
author: XCOM Team

scripts.test-trusted-mode: node --test scripts/tests/trusted-mode.test.js scripts/tests/openmanet.test.js scripts/tests/forced-offline.test.js scripts/tests/badgeText.test.js scripts/tests/hidden-items.test.js scripts/tests/packet.checkin.multi.test.js scripts/tests/teamRoster.squads.test.js
scripts.test: npm run test-trusted-mode && npm run test-callsign-geo && npm run test-layout
